comments.body: Wow, I'm very surprised that we're exposing this stuff in the public tasty-reflect API. If this is only used internally could it be `private[scala]` at least?
We are not. The CompilerInterface API is not accessible from user code. The `Reflection` mixes in this class without exposing its members.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@  def Constraints_context[T]: scala.quoted.QuoteContext
  def Constraints_add(syms: List[Symbol]): Boolean
  def Constraints_approximation(sym: Symbol, fromBelow: Boolean): Type
